metadata.title: CVE-2021-38173 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Btrbk before 0.31.2 allows command execution because of the mishandling ofremote hosts filtering SSH commands using ssh_filter_btrbk.sh inauthorized_keys.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-38173` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

btrbk - 0.27.1-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: btrbk package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.27.1-2').
